title: CeramicSpeed wants you to invest in their wild Driven drivetrain concept
content:
Remember that wild CeramicSpeed Driven drivetrain concept from Eurobike over the past few years? The one with a driveshaft rather than a chain? And a toothed platter rather than a cassette? Now you can invest in it and help it go from research project to reality. Here’s the short of it: Minimum single investment is […]

The post CeramicSpeed wants you to invest in their wild Driven drivetrain concept appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
